text: <@U8J1KET6K> today gave a very nice presentation of Agents.jl at SGH Warsaw School of Economics. The maturity and design of the package (and visualization in particular) is amazing.

text: We also plan to organize a workshop on this topic during <https://ssc2021.uek.krakow.pl/> so if you are interested you can contact <@U8J1KET6K> or me.
